text: Hogback Outlier is an Ancestral Puebloan outlier community located northwest of Chaco Culture National Historical Park, New Mexico. The community features a great house, great kiva, and thirty-five small house sites. ==References== ;Bibliography * Category:Colorado Plateau Category:Ancestral Puebloans Category:Post-Archaic period in North America Category:Archaeological sites in New Mexico Category:Chaco Canyon Category:Chaco Culture National Historical Park
title: Hogback Outlier
